for Diverse Suppliers

suppliers and use the intuitive Hire Ground
platform to accelerate business growth.

with other suppliers

Business Development Solutions for
Diverse Businesses
with B2B Solutions

Who are looking for warm
introductions to decision
makers within the Fortune
1000s.

Large Prime
Contractors

Who are searching for
diverse sub-contractors
to partner with.

Diverse Owned Businesses

Who identify as Women Owned
Business Enterprises or WBE's,
Minority Owned Business Enterprises
or MBE's , Veteran Owned Business
Enterprise or VoBE's, and LGBT
Owned Businesses.

We Are Hire Ground

We make enterprise and government supply chains more accessible and profitable for certified diverse small businesses.

  • We put diverse suppliers on the fast track to scale and sustainability that accelerate their learning, capacity-building, and implementation.
  • We offer our community exclusive online courses on business-growing essentials, including sales, finance, marketing, and HR.
  • We have a loyal community of talented diverse suppliers from around the world. Join to discover new partners, mentors, sub-contractors, and customers.
  • We put diverse suppliers on the fast track to scale and sustainability that accelerate their learning, capacity-building, and implementation.
  • We offer our community exclusive online courses on business-growing essentials, including sales, finance, marketing, and HR.
  • We have a loyal community of talented diverse suppliers from around the world. Join to discover new partners, mentors, sub-contractors, and customers.

How it Works
  • Set up your Supplier Account.
  • Complete your company profile in minutes.
  • Search for, and get matched with, corporate buyers that are looking for your products and services.
  • Meet and communicate with customers and partners directly in the Hire Ground messaging system.
Subscribe to a Wealth
of Opportunity
Hire Ground provides you with all the tools you need to discover procurement opportunities and work with Fortune 1000 companies.
Integration with Enterprise Software

We can integrate CRMs, ERP systems, Accounts Payable
software and supply chain management software.

Opportunity Management

Discover and get matched with opportunities in corporate and government supply chain
inclusion programs.

Platform Messaging

Use integrated messaging
and calendar tools for efficient communication with customers, partners, and colleagues.
